paper_abstract: This paper proposes a linear voltage-to-cur-rent converter with current reuse technique to reduce circuit power consumption without deteriorating its linearity and bandwidth. The proposed circuit is designed using 0.18 mu m CMOS process parameters from TSMC. Simulation results show that the total harmonic distortion (THD) of the proposed circuit with a 2.5-V input amplitude is less than 1% for input frequency up to 200 MHz under a 1.8-V supply voltage. The total current consumption is 10.8 mA.
paper_title: Linear voltage-to-current converters with current reuse technique
